# EligibleForAdAttributionKitReengagementPostbackCopies

**Property List Key**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the developer receives copies of AdAttributionKit reengagement postbacks.

## Discussion

Use this key to opt in to receive copies of reengagement postbacks. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AdAttributionKit/configuring-an-advertised-app].

## Ad attributions

- **AdNetworkIdentifiers**: An array of strings that identifies the ad networks a publisher app shows advertisements for.
- **AttributionCopyEndpoint**: A key that defines a URL that AdAttributionKit uses to deliver copies of ad attribution postbacks.
